column4: is there any problems if i install win xp 32 bit and kubuntu 7.04 64 bit? i want to store my mp3s on a fat32 partition so they will be accessible from both o/s
one warning, which may not matter to you, is that you won't be able to use flashplugin on 64 bit
thanks for saying that...i want to do that
if you want flash, better stick with 32 bit, then
